text: @JStein_WaPo @jdawsey1 Concern for the stock market and trivializing the coronavirus says all we need to know about this disgusting animal. His ego is all that matters. A justifiable consequence would be the orangutan contracting the disease. He "might" start paying attention. @SenateGOP #Peoplematter
